verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

Greatly <S%G1971>desiring<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> being <S%G3415>mindful<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1144>tears,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G5479>joy;<s%>

When I <S%G2983>call<s%> to <S%G5280>remembrance<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1774>dwelt<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3125>grandmother<s%> <S%G3090>Lois,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2131>Eunice;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G156><s%> I put thee in <S%G363>remembrance<s%> <S%G4671><s%> that thou stir <S%G329>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> putting <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1167>fear;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of a sound <S%G4995>mind.<s%>

Be <S%G3361>not<s%> thou <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> of <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> be thou partaker of the <S%G4777>afflictions<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

Who hath <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> us with a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2821>calling,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> which was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the world <S%G5550>began,<s%> <S%G166><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> is <S%G3568>now<s%> made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who hath <S%G2673>abolished<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> hath brought life and immortality to <S%G5461>light<s%> <S%G2222><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G861><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G5087>appointed<s%> a <S%G2783>preacher,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

For <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> these <S%G5023>things:<s%> <S%G235>nevertheless<s%> I am <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> that which I have committed unto <S%G3866>him<s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

Hold <S%G2192>fast<s%> the <S%G5296>form<s%> of <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

That good <S%G2570>thing<s%> which was committed unto <S%G3872>thee<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> which <S%G1774>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us.<s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> thou <S%G1492>knowest,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> be turned away <S%G654>from<s%> <S%G3165>me;<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5436>Phygellus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2061>Hermogenes.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G3683>Onesiphorus;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G4178>oft<s%> <S%G404>refreshed<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> chain: <S%G254><s%>
But, <S%G235><s%> when he <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4516>Rome,<s%> he sought me <S%G2212>out<s%> <S%G3165><s%> very <S%G4706>diligently,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> me.

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>grant<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> that he may <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in how many <S%G3745>things<s%> he ministered <S%G1247>unto<s%> me <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> very <S%G957>well.<s%>
